EmailTemplate.name: MURTEC - E-mail 1.E-mail #1
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP to Mingle at our VIP Party in Vegas #MURTEC
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} Please RSVP <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRcRFvOfptvMtNjDzKoPoPWexUNFpDVldUWTE0VFlNOEMyTVdMR0kwRjlIOC4u]]> to attend our exclusive NCR Cocktail Party at MURTEC to mingle with industry visionaries, NCR leaders and friends.  NCR Customer Cocktail Party at MURTEC Eiffel Tower Lounge - Paris Hotel Tuesday, March 10 6:30 - 8:30pm Space is limited so please add your name to the list today! We hope to see you in Las Vegas! P.S. Book a meeting <[[https://www.ncr.com/events/murtec-2020]]> with NCR at MURTEC to demo frictionless experiences and an exciting new platform architecture that works with the tech stack {{company.Company Name:default=your company}} already has... to give you what you don't. Book your booth meeting.  <[[https://www.ncr.com/events/murtec-2020]]> Space is limited so please add your name to the list today! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
